scripts.test:api: redis-cli flushall && npm run start:detached && sleep 2 && dredd -r html apiary.apib http://localhost:8080 && npm stop
scripts.prepublish: npm run build # also runs npm run prebuild
scripts.publish:do: npm shrinkwrap && echo npm publish && rm npm-shrinkwrap.json
scripts.publish:patch: npm run prepublish && npm version patch --git-tag-version=false --sign-git-tag=true -m "Version bumped to %s" && npm run publish:do
scripts.publish:minor: npm run prepublish && npm version minor --git-tag-version=false --sign-git-tag=true -m "Version bumped to %s" && npm run publish:do
scripts.publish:major: npm run prepublish && npm version major --git-tag-version=false --sign-git-tag=true -m "Version bumped to %s" && npm run publish:do
scripts.docker:build: npm run prebuild && git checkout docker/latest && (git merge develop || true) && git checkout --ours -- README.md && git add --force -- README.md && git commit -am "Merge develop branch on docker/lastest" && docker build -t joola/joola .
scripts.gh-pages: npm run gh-pages:init && npm run gh-pages:docs && npm run gh-pages:site && npm run gh-pages:git
scripts.gh-pages:docs: npm run gh-pages:docs:cleanup:before && npm run gh-pages:docs:gollum-site && npm run gh-pages:docs:cleanup:after
scripts.gh-pages:docs:gollum-site: npm run gh-pages:docs:gollum-site:init && npm run gh-pages:docs:gollum-site:build && npm run gh-pages:docs:gollum-site:refactor
scripts.gh-pages:site: npm run gh-pages:site:cleanup:before && npm run gh-pages:site:jekyll && npm run gh-pages:site:cleanup:after
scripts.gh-pages:site:jekyll: npm run gh-pages:site:jekyll:init && npm run gh-pages:site:jekyll:build && npm run gh-pages:site:jekyll:search-index
scripts.gh-pages:git: npm run gh-pages:git:branch-and-prep && npm run gh-pages:git:shape&& npm run gh-pages:git:commit && echo npm run gh-pages:git:push
scripts.gh-pages:git:branch-and-prep: (git branch -qD gh-pages || true) && git checkout --orphan gh-pages && git rm -rf --cached . && cp -R ./build/pages/resources/.gitignore ./.gitignore
scripts.git:check: count=$(expr $(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | egrep "^(M| M)" | wc -l)) && if [ $count -ne 0 ]; then echo Git repository is dirty [$count change\(s\) found].; exit 1; fi; exit 0
